scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && cd ../ && cd genkit-app && npm run build
scripts.setup: npm i && cd server && npm i && cd ../genkit-app && npm i
scripts.start:server:idx:
echo -e '\033[1mChoose a Cloud Project with the Vertex APIs enabled\033[0m in the popup
See https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/api/aiplatform.googleapis.com/metrics' && npm run start:server

name: js-chatbot
description: This is a simple chatbot app build with Genkit and Angular
